translations: 用热水从空酒桶中浸出酒

sentences.sentence: "The place was on fire," he recalls. "Grog was everywhere."
sentences.translation: 他回忆说“这个地方着火了，烈酒是无处不在。”

sentences.sentence: During the party there was always a grog tray in the library.
sentences.translation: 在聚会期间，图书室里总放着一托盘的兑了水的烈性酒。

sentences.sentence: Some remote settlements have imposed their own grog bans, and coped well; others have not.
sentences.translation: 有些偏远的聚居地还自行制定了饮酒禁令且应对得当，其他地方则没有。
